name: Heinz® Classic Meatloaf
author: Heinz
summary: This comfort food recipe will bring back memories of mom's home cooking and family time around the dinner table. For the ultimate in nostalgia, be sure to serve with a generous spoonful of fluffy mashed potatoes.
ingredients: ¼ cup finely chopped green pepper
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (180 degrees C)
Heat oil in a skillet set over medium-high heat
Cook onion, celery and pepper until softened, about 5 minutes
Remove pan from heat and divide sauce mixture in half
Combine one half of the sauce with ground beef, breadcrumbs, egg, salt and pepper
Pat mixture into a lightly greased 9-x 5-in (2 L) loaf pan
Bake for 1 hour or until an instant read thermometer reaches 160 degrees  F (70 degrees  C)
Slice meat loaf and serve with sauce
